Task ID:
\h(《ヴァイス》)緊急時用のロープや工具が
収納されてる箱だ。最新鋭艦でも
非常事態の備えは必要だもんな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)伝声管だ。
どうやら、ブリッジに
つながってるらしいな。\e

\h(《ギルダー》)いよう、ヴァイス。
こちら、ブリッジだ。
どこをほっつき歩いてんだ？\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)伝声管だ。
ブリッジにつながっている。\e

\h(《ファイナ》)はい、ブリッジです。
あ、ヴァイスさんでしたか。
見張り台は気持ちいいですよね。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)伝声管だ。
ブリッジにつながっている。\e

\h(《ファイナ》)はい、ブリッジです！
ヴァイスさん、何してるんです？
船は危険な状態なんですよ！\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)見張り台は異常なし！
これより甲板の敵を
ぶったおしに行くぜ！\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)このサーチライトのおかげで
夜間もガンガン飛べる。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)緊急時用のロープや工具が
収納されてる箱だ。最新鋭艦でも
非常事態の備えは必要だもんな。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)たまには武器を虫干ししないと
さやの中でさびついたり
皮袋のなかで臭くなったりする。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)伝声管だ。
ブリッジにつながっている。\c

\h(《アイカ》)はーい、こちらブリッジ！
なんだ、ヴァイスなの？
遊んでないで戻ってきなよ〜。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)伝声管だ。
ブリッジにつながっている。\c

\h(《アイカ》)はい、こちらブリッジ！
ヴァイス、なにやってんの？
さっさと船を修理しなさいよ！\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)やっぱり船の上だと
洗たく物の乾きが早いな。
雲の上なら天気の心配もないし。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)クルーたちの昼メシだ。
立派なキッチンがあるから
空の上でもけっこう豪華だ。\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)かなりハデにやられちまった。
これ以上、戦闘を重ねると
沈没の危険性があるな……\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)サロンの扉を閉鎖しやがったな。
とにかく、ムラジがいるはずの
ブリッジを確保しなければ！\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)ちっ、閉鎖されてる。
まずはムラジがいるはずの
ブリッジに急ごう！\c

\h(《ヴァイス》)この空域では
うかつに外に出るのは危険だ。
この扉は閉鎖しておこう。\c

\h(《Pow》)Pow pow pow pow pow!
Pow pow pow pow!\c
\h(《Marco》)Damn! Damn! This fire just won't go out!!\e

\h(《Merida》)Hot hot hot!
Captain, hurry! The ship needs repairs! We're 
going to crash!!!\c

\h(《Tikatika》)Hmm… The ship is on fire. I think it would
probably be good to fix the ship. I don't think
it is good for the ship to be on fire.\c

\h(《Khazim》)Don't just stand there gawking!
Hurry up and put the fire out!
We'll crash if you don't hurry!\e
\h(《Khazim's Men》)Yessir! Right away sir!\c

\h(《Khazim's Gunner》)C'mon!
Fire, just go out already!
Ouch! Hot hot hot!\c
\h(《Khazim's Gunner》)Hah! I'm not going to quit now!\c

\h(《Kirala》)I can do some emergency repairs to seal up some
of the holes in the hull, but the ship's in need
of more than that, Captain!\c

\h(《Izmael》)The damage is too great for these makeshift 
repairs to do any good!\e

\h(《Izmael》)If we don't take some drastic measures soon, 
this ship is finished!\c

\h(《Belle》)Take that! And that! Oh, go out already!!! Why 
won't these fires just go out!?!\c

\h(《Lilly》)Ahh! Captain! Do something will ya?! The ship is
gonna crash!!\c
\h(《Nara》)\ecough, cough\e It's too hot! I, I can't getclose enough! Captain, do something!!\c

\h(《Domingo》)Hey hey… Vyse!
Your ship is on fire. Don't you think you should
do something about all this?\c

\h(《Enrique》)Vyse, if we continue fighting much longer in 
this state, we will surely die.\c

\h(《Enrique》)Vyse, if we continue fighting much longer in 
this state, we will surely die.\c

\h(《Enrique》)Vyse, let me go with you. Let me fight by 
your side.\e

\h(《Will you take Enrique with you?》)”Of course.”
”Sorry, I need you to stay here.”\e

\h(《Vyse》)Of course, Enrique.
C'mon, I need you to help me defeat Ramirez.\e

\h(《Enrique》)Thank you, Vyse!
I will fight to the best of my abilities. 
I will not let you down.\e
\h(　)Enrique has joined your party.\c

\h(《Enrique》)Oh… I see. Well, if you change your mind, just 
let me know. I'm always ready to fight.\c

\h(《Drachma》)Vyse, your ship has taken too much damage. You
must do somethin' to fix the ship or else we're
finished.\c

\h(《Drachma》)You're goin' to go into that island, boy? You're
crazier than I thought…\e

\h(《Drachma》)… But if you insist on goin', I can't let you 
go alone.\e

\h(《Will you take Drachma with you?》)”C'mon, Captain!”
”Sorry, but I need you to stay here.”\e

\h(《Vyse》)I'm counting on you, Captain!
With your experience, and that arm of yours,
Ramirez doesn't stand a chance!\e

\h(《Drachma》)Hrmph… I can't believe I'm fightin' with you 
again…\e
\h(　)Drachma has joined your party.\c

\h(《Drachma》)I see.
I don't like it, but if you change your mind, 
let me know.\c

\h(《Gilder》)Hey, Vyse.
Um… the ship's looking a little… bad.
Maybe you should fix it or something…\c

\h(《Gilder》)I know we're close to ending this thing, but 
don't you think you should at least fix your 
ship first?\c
\h(《Gilder》)Hey, Vyse. This sounds like fun. Count me in.\e

\h(《Will you take Gilder with you?》)”Of course, who else would I take?”
”Sorry, but I need you to stay here.”\e

\h(《Vyse》)Of course, who else would I take?
I need you to help me defeat Ramirez!\e

\h(《Gilder》)Heh… I figured as much. Looks like it's finally
time to get a little serious.\e
\h(　)Gilder has joined the party.\c

\h(《Gilder》)Hey, don't get my hopes up like that. If you
change your mind, I'll be right here. Besides, I
don't really have anything better to do.\c
